description.fr_FR: Plugin permet de parler à Google Home/Assistant par le biais des interactions Jeedom
description.en_US: Plugin allows talking to Google Home / Assistant through Jeedom interactions
description.es_ES: El complemento permite hablar con Google Home / Assistant a través de las interacciones de Jeedom
description.de_DE: Das Plugin ermöglicht die Kommunikation mit Google Home / Assistant über Jeedom-Interaktionen
description.pt_PT: O plug-in permite conversar com o Google Home / Assistant por meio de interações Jeedom
